titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Forasmuch as the Queenes Maiestie our soueraigne Ladie, is credibly enformed, that the infection of the plague is at this present in sundrie places in and about the citie of London ...
Proclamations. 1574-10-01
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: By Newgate market, next vnto Christs Church, by Richarde Iugge [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill], printer to the Queenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Actual printers' names and publication date from STC.
Adjourning Michaelmas term because of plague--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
